root: ^FEMI: (apologetic) Edrice, I'm sorry. The envy consumed me, what I did was terrible. Forgive me. .
^EDRICE: (forgiving) Femi, I am not innocent either, I am sorry for my part in this too, I hope you find it in your heart to forgive me. I forgive you, let us put the past behind us.
^They embrace, and Nolwazi watches as the two women make amends.
